thread.title: Energy Efficiency Saves US Manufacturers $2.4 Billion
thread.title_full: Energy Efficiency Saves US Manufacturers $2.4 Billion

title: Energy Efficiency Saves US Manufacturers $2.4 Billion
text:
07 Energy Efficiency Saves US Manufacturers $2.4 Billion 
Clean Technica: Energy efficiency has saved large manufacturers in the United States an estimated $2.4 billion in energy costs over the past five years, and could generate over $11 billion in annual energy savings by 2020.These eye-popping stats come from the US Department of Energy’s Better Plants Program, a multi-sector initiative to improve the energy efficiency of America’s commercial, residential, and industrial buildings.
